articles.title: Derrick White, Celtics get red-hot and run away from Heat late: 8 takeaways
articles.description:
The Celtics won the game with a franchise-record 10 3-pointers in the fourth quarter.

The post Derrick White, Celtics get red-hot and run away from Heat late: 8 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
